summary: Gote and Eli are two aging friends who don't want to age. Gote is a lifeguard who's fighting peepers on the Tel-Aviv beach. Eli is a guitar player who dreams of building a night club in Altman's restaurant.
cast: Arik Einstein|Uri Zohar|Sima Eliyahu|Mona Silberstein|Tzvi Shissel|Mordechai Ben-Ze'ev|Moti Mizrahi|Motti Levi|Mordecai Arnon|Margalit Ankory|Zvia Doron|Eddie Cogan|Aharonchik|Esther Zewko|Tova Farber|Dov Friedman|Yihye Tzabari|Giora Klein|Abir Zoref|David Ricardo|Amos Houdini|Avigdor Tzabari|Natan Zahavi|Meirav Hoenig
title: Metzitzim
